CustomField.formula: NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Compliance"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Contract"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Homologation"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Go Live"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Frozen"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Processing"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Terminated") ) )
CustomField.label: Can Edit Fields Negotiation
